import {AiFillMedicineBox} from "react-icons/ai" import {BiTrash} from "react-icons/bi" import Search from "./components/Search" import AddOrder from "./components/AddOrder" // import DropDown from "./components/DropDown" import OrderList from "./data.json" function App() { return (

Medi Care

    {OrderList.map(order=>(
  • {appointment.petName} {order.aptDate}
    Owner: {order.ownerName}
    {order.aptNotes}
    • ))}
); } export default App;
